text: This is hilarious! I love the creativity of the hacker community. Can't wait to see what other crazy ideas people come up with.
Agreed! It's always amazing to see what can be done with a little ingenuity and some spare parts.
Who needs a separate pizza slicer when you can just use your keyboard? I love it!
This is just ridiculous. What's next, turning your mouse into a toaster? Let's focus on actual hacking, people.
Lighten up, Jimmy! This is a fun project that shows off some real technical skill. Plus, who doesn't love pizza?
Exactly, Cyber Ninja! Jimmy just doesn't appreciate the true artistry of pizza slicing.
I can't believe I'm saying this, but I actually want to try this out myself. Who knew hacking and lunch could be combined in such a delicious way?
Right? I'm always looking for ways to streamline my hacking process, and this seems like the perfect solution. Plus, pizza is my favorite food!
I'm definitely going to try this out too. I wonder if I can use my mouse as a cheese grater...
